info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.Player

  • @Entity
public class Player
extends Object
    A player represents a user in the gamification application, eg. an employee of an organisation or a customer. By the creation, each player is assigned a nickname and certain roles. Each player has a list for his earned rewards, already finished Goals and finished Tasks. Points, coins and index of a level can be earned or raised by fulfilling tasks in the gamification application. Furthermore a player can have an avatar. A player can be set active or can be deactivated so that she/he cannot complete tasks. By default every created player is active until she/he is deactivated. Each player can also have a list of contacts which represent other players in the same organisation to send little presents. At a later point of time it is possible to change the password, nickname, avatar and the roles or contacts a player has.

      • getFinishedGoalsByGoal

        public List<FinishedGoal> getFinishedGoalsByGoal(Goal goal)
        This method checks if one specific goal was already finished and gets all finished goals objects of this type in one list. If no goal of this type of was completed an empty list is returned.
        Parameters:
        goal - The goal that should be compared with all other already obtained goals.
        Returns:
        The list of all finished goals that match the compared goal.

      • spent

        public void spent(int amount)

      • donate

        public boolean donate(DonationCall dCall,
                      int amount)
        If a player donates an amount of obtained coins to a specified DonationCall, the amount will be subtracted of her/his current amount of coins. Before this step it is checked if the player has enough coins for the donation. It the player has enough coins true is returned otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        dCall - The DonationCall a player donates for.
        amount - The specified amount of donated coins.
        Returns:
        boolean that is true if a player has enough coins for a donation otherwise false.

        Parameters:
        contactList - All contacts of a player who reprents other player in the gamification application.

      • enoughPrize

        public boolean enoughPrize(int prize)
        This method checks if a player has enough coins for example to make a bid or donate.
        Parameters:
        prize - The prize that should be spent or donated.
        Returns:
        boolean that is true if a player has enough coins otherwise false.

      • addContacts

        public boolean addContacts(Collection<? extends Player> contacts)
        Adds one or more players to a player's list of contacts. If the player who is the owner of this list she/he is removed.
        Parameters:
        contacts - List of one ore more player who should be added to the player's contact list.
        Returns:
        boolean value

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean value

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Checks if a player is active in the gamificated application. This is needed for example to complete a task.
        Returns:
        True if the player is active and false if not.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean isActive)
        Sets the value if a player is active or not.
        Parameters:
        isActive - The current value if a player is active (true) or not (false).

      • addRoles

        public void addRoles(List<Role> newRoles)
        This method adds one or more roles to the player's list of roles, but only if they are not in this list already.
        Parameters:
        newRoles - The roles that should be added to the player's current list of roles.

      • checkNickname

        public boolean checkNickname(String nickname,
                             List<Player> players)
        This method checks, if the passed nickname of the user is already used by another user.
        Parameters:
        nickname - Nickname that is checked.
        players - All players of the same organisationation.
        Returns:
        True if the nickname is already used, false if not.
